OMG THANK YOU SO MUCH, everybody who now uses fraps and hates the fps drops and that, GET THIS, i always wanted to record red orchestra 2, but i tried 60fps half size fraps, no luck fps drops to 20-30, but now i tried dxtory, fps drops NEVER it stays at your default one, and you can select what resolution to record, i play in 1680x1050 and record in a 640x360 havent tried higher but it looks good enough and framerate is steady! i love this. thank you so much: )
